headline: GTA Online
subtitle: On the Podium: Declasse Hotring Sabre with 19 Patriot Beer Livery
content: In between fireworks fights, stop by the lobby of The Diamond Casino & Resort to give the Lucky Wheel a spin. You could walk away with GTA$, RP, clothing, snacks, plus mystery prizes of all shapes and sizes. This week’s top prize on the podium is the Declasse Hotring Sabre — appropriately decked out in the Patriot Beer Livery for maximum America points — built to tear up the Hotring Circuit.
